name: Ten Lives
headline: Decarbonizing food proteins with AI.
description: We optimize microbial factories to produce proteins at the lowest possible cost and environmental impact. Our mission is to make sustainable protein sources a cost-viable alternative, for all members of the family.

founders.name: Vicki Mo, Founder
founders.description: Vicki has experience ranging from finetuning SOTA machine learning models to shipping both digital and physical products. In 2015, she was the USA and French Div 1 National Champion in the sport of epee fencing. Vicki received her MS in Computer Science - Machine Learning from Columbia University.

founders.name: Ruby Yu, Founder
founders.description:
Ruby has spent the past decade investigating gene expression in organisms ranging from yeast to humans, and she is an industry-leading expert on high-throughput genetic screens for machine learning. She received both her BA and her PhD in Biological and Biomedical Sciences from Harvard University.

Her extra-laboratorial activities include circus arts, climbing, and cat-sitting.

raw_markdown='[![ten lives logo
](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6408ce9c8ca916d18cf41a77/640a2558306dad3d75fc2f5d_ten-lives-logo.png)](https://tenlives.com/<#>)[Get snacks](https://tenlives.com/<#snax>)
![ten lives snack package
](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6408ce9c8ca916d18cf41a77/6408cf35083a04538a7dd41b_ethical-protein.webp)
![ten lives snacks](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6408ce9c8ca916d18cf41a77/6408d87d80c7da0c909a19e3_treats_vertical.webp)![ten lives treats
](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6408ce9c8ca916d18cf41a77/6409157b083a045c8582d4d3_treats.webp)
## **SNACKS**
Get Early Access (limited quantities)
10 sustainable snacks for your cat, or one snack for each of your 10 cats.Healthy, tasty, and sustainable! We brew **clean protein** for your carnivorous feline friends, without harming a single animal soul. Our goal is to feed as many cats as possible, reducing the fifth of the world's meat that is consumed by pets.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6408ce9c8ca916d18cf41a77/6408d94de7c9a720c65bab7d_bullet-point.svg)
1 ton of animal protein replaced = 5,000 animal lives saved.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6408ce9c8ca916d18cf41a77/6408d94de7c9a720c65bab7d_bullet-point.svg)
Healthily replacing animal protein for all cats = CO2 equivalent of 27 million cars off the road.
Each lickable treat contains an irresistible blend of kill-free, harm-free ingredients wrapped in the most sustainable packaging that we can source. With your purchase, you will **support our mission** and receive one of the first snack packs - post-extensive testing & veterinarian-approval. We will only feed to your fur babies what we have first fed to ours.
[order meow ($18)](https://tenlives.com/<https:/buy.stripe.com/bIY3e91eA52v3YY8wA>)[Updates only](https://tenlives.com/<https:/forms.gle/9z1dMmaXQRR3mGL49>)
## **FAQ**
Will your food satisfy my cat's primal urges?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6408ce9c8ca916d18cf41a77/6408dac9083a046abc7ed021_plus-icon.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6408ce9c8ca916d18cf41a77/6408d94de7c9a720c65bab7d_bullet-point.svg)
Yes! The protein we use in our cat food is the same as those found in the natural prey of cats. Thanks to our purification process, it is a cleaner protein than most of the "meat" that goes into pet food, without the unnecessary loss of animal lives.
What are the ingredients in the cat snack?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6408ce9c8ca916d18cf41a77/6408dac9083a046abc7ed021_plus-icon.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6408ce9c8ca916d18cf41a77/6408d94de7c9a720c65bab7d_bullet-point.svg)
We are currently purrfecting our cat snack formula and sourcing the tastiest harm-free ingredients appropriate for carnivorous cats.
How does the science work?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6408ce9c8ca916d18cf41a77/6408dac9083a046abc7ed021_plus-icon.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6408ce9c8ca916d18cf41a77/6408d94de7c9a720c65bab7d_bullet-point.svg)
We brew protein! When making beer, microbes convert sugar to alcohol. Our microbes convert sugar to protein - the same protein that cats eat in the wild. After this process, we separate the protein out, thank the microbes for their hard work, and put only the protein into our cat food. Our final product is non-GMO.
Is this vegan?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6408ce9c8ca916d18cf41a77/6408dac9083a046abc7ed021_plus-icon.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6408ce9c8ca916d18cf41a77/6408d94de7c9a720c65bab7d_bullet-point.svg)
Yes - both our snacks and food are vegan, but without compromising carnivore health.
When will I get my cat snacks?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6408ce9c8ca916d18cf41a77/6408dac9083a046abc7ed021_plus-icon.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6408ce9c8ca916d18cf41a77/6408d94de7c9a720c65bab7d_bullet-point.svg)
We're looking to get them in your hands / paws in 2024 (exact dates depending on location).
Can I cancel or return after ordering?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6408ce9c8ca916d18cf41a77/6408dac9083a046abc7ed021_plus-icon.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6408ce9c8ca916d18cf41a77/6408d94de7c9a720c65bab7d_bullet-point.svg)
Yes - just shoot us an email at meow@tenlives.com.
Cool and all, but who are you?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6408ce9c8ca916d18cf41a77/6408dac9083a046abc7ed021_plus-icon.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6408ce9c8ca916d18cf41a77/6408d94de7c9a720c65bab7d_bullet-point.svg)
Hi! We're Ruby and Vicki, self-professed cat ladies. Ruby is a world-class scientist (Harvard, UCSF) who is now directing her brainpower to making sustainable food healthier, and Vicki is an engineer who really loves cats. Together, with a team of veterinarians, we care about making the tastiest, healthiest, most sustainable food for your furry friends.
If you would like to chat about cats please get in touch:meow@tenlives.com
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6408ce9c8ca916d18cf41a77/64090d5637c774e715d2e980_cat-1.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6408ce9c8ca916d18cf41a77/64090da85196e9b270206d25_cat-3.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6408ce9c8ca916d18cf41a77/64090e3cd8cc0c6eebf85d2d_cat-5.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6408ce9c8ca916d18cf41a77/64090da83978236c2c2ae2d8_cat-2.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6408ce9c8ca916d18cf41a77/64090e3c083a043769826467_cat-4.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6408ce9c8ca916d18cf41a77/64090e3c7fd405da23e5c72d_cat-6.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6408ce9c8ca916d18cf41a77/64090eb773270814c07a16f7_cat-7.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6408ce9c8ca916d18cf41a77/64090ee380c7dac8b79dc295_cat-8.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6408ce9c8ca916d18cf41a77/64090f1a7ccb0e7d2c019c35_cat-9.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6408ce9c8ca916d18cf41a77/64090d5637c774e715d2e980_cat-1.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6408ce9c8ca916d18cf41a77/64090da85196e9b270206d25_cat-3.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6408ce9c8ca916d18cf41a77/64090e3cd8cc0c6eebf85d2d_cat-5.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6408ce9c8ca916d18cf41a77/64090da83978236c2c2ae2d8_cat-2.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6408ce9c8ca916d18cf41a77/64090e3c083a043769826467_cat-4.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6408ce9c8ca916d18cf41a77/64090e3c7fd405da23e5c72d_cat-6.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6408ce9c8ca916d18cf41a77/64090eb773270814c07a16f7_cat-7.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6408ce9c8ca916d18cf41a77/64090ee380c7dac8b79dc295_cat-8.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6408ce9c8ca916d18cf41a77/64090f1a7ccb0e7d2c019c35_cat-9.svg)

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Ten Lives**  
[**Ten Lives**](https://tenlives.com) is on a mission to decarbonize food proteins using artificial intelligence. The company's initial focus was on optimizing microbial factories to produce sustainable proteins that are both environmentally friendly and cost-effective. This mission aims to make sustainable protein sources accessible for everyone, particularly benefiting pet owners and their animals.

**Founding and Background**  
Founded in the Y Combinator Batch S22, Ten Lives is a startup that leverages the latest advancements in AI and biotechnology to innovate around food production. While specific founding details are marked as "nan," it’s clear that the company is equipped with a small but dedicated team of six employees.

**What They Do**  
Ten Lives specializes in creating **sustainable snacks for cats** that utilize clean protein derived from microbial fermentation. This process mimics the natural protein found in the diet of wild cats but does so without harming any animals. The company's ultimate goal is to mitigate the significant meat consumption by pets—currently about one-fifth of the world's meat—thereby saving animal lives and reducing carbon emissions equivalent to taking 27 million cars off the road.

Their product offerings include a range of tasty and health-conscious snacks designed for various cats, appealing even to the most discerning feline palates. Each lickable treat is created with ingredients chosen for their health benefits and sustainability, packaged in eco-friendly materials.

**The Team**  
The creative team behind Ten Lives includes Ruby, a seasoned scientist with an impressive background from Harvard and UCSF, and Vicki, an engineer who shares a deep love for cats. Joined by veterinarians and other specialists, this passionate group is committed to delivering the highest quality and healthiest food for pets.

**Future Plans**  
Ten Lives is gearing up for product launches in 2024 and is excited about offering early access to a limited number of snack packs. The company is keen to engage with its audience, emphasizing customer support and community involvement. They even invite cat enthusiasts to reach out for discussions—because who doesn’t love talking about their pets?

**Conclusion**  
In a world that’s grappling with sustainability, Ten Lives is positioning itself as an innovative leader in the pet food market. By marrying technology and a love for animals, they strive to create a greener future—one snack at a time. If you're looking for a guilt-free way to treat your cat, keep an eye on Ten Lives; their approach could redefine what it means to feed our furry companions responsibly.
